Issue.summary: release txsim as soon as the transaction is simulated
Issue.description: txsim acquires a shared lock on the stateDB which restrict block commits, i.e., commiting valid write-sets to the stateDB. Hence, we should close txsim as soon as the tx is simulated and the rwset is collected. Definitely before gossip dissemination, we must release the shared lock.
